sentences.en: a career which spanned nearly 60 years
sentences.cn: 持续了差不多 60 年的职业生涯

sentences.en: Gradually the time span between sessions will increase.
sentences.cn: 会议之间的间隔将逐渐延长。

sentences.en: Here the span of water was short.
I worked with him over a span of six years.
sentences.cn: 我和他共事达六年之久。

sentences.en: It is a very pretty butterfly, with a 2 inch wing span.
sentences.cn: 这是一只非常美丽的蝴蝶，翼展2英寸。

sentences.en: It may be that you are unaware of where your hip joint is; it is not at the waist but a good hand span below it.
sentences.cn: 这也许是因为你并不晓得髋关节的位置，它不在腰部，而是位于腰部以下一手拃宽处。

sentences.en: It was the personification of the old term spick and span.
sentences.cn: 俗话用"一水没洗"形容衣服挺括簇新,在这里一点不假.

sentences.en: It’ll be difficult to hire that many new staff in such a short time span .
sentences.cn: 在这么短的时间里要想招聘到那么多新员工是很难的。
很多桥横亘在泰晤士河上.

sentences.en: The apartment was spick and span.
The batteries had a life span of six hours.
sentences.cn: 这些电池的寿命为6小时。

sentences.en: The boss likes everything spick and span in the office.
sentences.cn: 老板喜欢办公室里一切都井井有条.

sentences.en: The bridge crosses the river in a single span.
The bridge has a span of 100 metres.
The plane had a wing span of 34ft and a length of 22ft.
sentences.cn: 这架飞机的翼展长34英尺，机身长22英尺。

sentences.en: They have extended the potential life span of humanity everywhere.
sentences.cn: 世界各地人类的预期寿命均有所延长。

sentences.en: Though simply furnished, the rooms were spick - and - span.
sentences.cn: 房间的陈设虽然简单, 但是非常整洁.

sentences.en: Travellers get from one side to the other by walking across a footbridge that spans a little stream.
sentences.cn: 旅游者通过一座横跨小溪的人行桥从一边走到另一边。

sentences.en: When the bird lifts off into flight, its wings unfold to an impressive six-foot span.
sentences.cn: 这种鸟起飞时，翼展可达6英尺，很惊人。

words.tran_cn: 扳手；螺丝扳手；测量器；用手掌量的人

phrases.tran_cn: 注意广度；注意力的持续时间

trans.tran_cn: 持续时间，间隔，跨度，墩距，范围
trans.tran_en: a period of time between two dates or events
A bridge or other structure that spans something such as a river or a valley stretches right across it

trans.tran_cn: 持续，横跨，跨越，包括，涵盖
trans.tran_en: to include all of a period of time

trans.tran_cn: 持续， 贯穿； 包括； 横跨， 跨越
trans.tran_en: to include all of a period of time
